name: CC: The Girl Who Chants Love at The Edge of Time
name_original: CC: The Girl Who Chants Love at The Edge of Time
description:
''CC: The Girl Who chants Love at The Edge of Time " Is a unique game with a  unique story. A game I never made anything like before.

Saying anything about it feels like spoiling it so I urge you to go into it blind.

It's a very short game after all.

                (Game can be played in your browser  -No Download is Needed- )

PS: When playing on your browser for the first time, the game might take a few seconds to Ioad data so please be patient.
